meanings.definition: To make a process operate automatically.
meanings.sent1: I will automate the sprinkler system to turn on at the same time every morning.
meanings.sent2: The factory decided to automate their assembly line to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: It would be funny if the toaster suddenly tried to automate making breakfast for us.
meanings.sent4: Her brain seemed to automate the process of tying shoelaces, as if on autopilot.
meanings.sent5: The robot's programming was so advanced, it could automate complex tasks with ease.

meanings.definition: To control or operate by automation.
meanings.sent1: We can automate the lights in the house to turn on when it gets dark outside.
meanings.sent2: The traffic lights are automated to change based on the flow of cars.
meanings.sent3: Imagine if our pets could automate feeding themselves when they're hungry.
meanings.sent4: His fingers seemed to automate the piano keys, dancing effortlessly across the notes.
meanings.sent5: The software was designed to automate the process of sending out emails to customers.
